meta.description: Optimize the number of processes J and P to maximize metal extraction under water and pollution constraints.

sets.name: PROCESSES
sets.description: Types of processes for metal extraction

params.name: metal_extraction
params.description: Units of metal extracted per process

params.name: water_usage
params.description: Units of water used per process

params.name: pollution_production
params.description: Units of pollution produced per process

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of times each process is performed

objective.name: max_metal_extraction
objective.description: Maximize the total amount of metal extracted

constraints.name: water_constraint
constraints.description: Total water usage must not exceed available water

constraints.name: pollution_constraint
constraints.description: Total pollution produced must not exceed allowed pollution
